name: Careless memories
description:
This is the 1st of a 4 pictures set about human absence, remains of our signs in a human free word.

The set has been shot on a digital reflex camera with a vintage soviet lens.

Bringing back objects from the past, such as these lenses of the '60s / '70s is one of the point of the project.

These images of abandoned places are taken with forgotten lenses, lost in time and space.

So the observer and the observed acquire both a new meaning, far from their creators.
